name: Cat and Mouse Horror Game
description:
Cat and Mouse Horror Game was made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

The theme for the jam was  "Out of Control."

In this game, you must direct a mouse through a labyrinth, but the only way to control him is by placing a trail of cheese for him to follow. The problem however is that he won't always go after the cheese you placed. He will try to eat booby trapped cheese as well, and trying to get the mouses attention will be a problem.

That is not all. If he eats too much cheese, he will die from overeating, and the cats will eat what is left of him.

Did I say there were cats too? Not good...

Warning: This game contains screamers and is not for the faint of heart.
